      • DeltaHardwareMecanum

        public DeltaHardwareMecanum(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap hdwMap,
                            Invert invert)
        Constructor for the delta hardware mecanum class Do not forget to initialize the motors with initHardware()
        Parameters:
        hdwMap - The current OpMode hardware map
        invert - Enum specifying which side will be inverted (motors), most of the time you need to invert the right side.

    • Method Detail

      • initHardware

        public void initHardware(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor frontleft,
                         com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor frontright,
                         com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor backleft,
                         com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor backright,
                         boolean brake)
        Initialize motors.
        Parameters:
        frontleft - The front left motor of the chassis.
        frontright - The front right motor of the chassis.
        backleft - The back left motor of the chassis.
        backright - The back right motor of the chassis.
        brake - brake the motors when their power is 0
